comprehensive_overview: Intel Math Kernel Library (Intel MKL) is a highly optimized, thread-safe, mathematical library for performing mathematical, statistical, and data analysis computations. It offers high-performance implementations of BLAS, LAPACK, ScaLAPACK, sparse solvers, FFT, and more for Intel processors.
core_features: Highly optimized mathematical library; Thread-safe functions; Implementations of BLAS, LAPACK, ScaLAPACK, FFT, sparse solvers, and more; Supports Intel processors for improved performance.
